name: Big Personalized Quizes
description:
Big Personalized Quizes is a python-made quiz game, where you answer questions the questions, can be costumized by simply editing two text documents!

To answer the questions, you just have to type the answer. To make questions, you need to create a "questions.txt" and a "answers.txt" files, write the questions in the order you want, and save them.

It is text based and works in a terminal, a documentation will be present along with the game executable.
